categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File 5

The Official Star Wars Fact File 5 was the fifth issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, released on January 30, 2002. The issue was authored by Darren Allanson, David Bailey, Chris Gardner, and Iain Lowson. It also contained an original illustration by Carl Lyons.
The Grand Admiral Thrawn article includes original artwork by Carl Lyons.
